name: Digital Marketing Team
description: Local businesses need online marketing teams to spread their potential audience. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Work Placement Opportunities
description: Several businesses visited Maker's Centre to advertise placement in their workplaces, an abundance of Maker's Centre participants tries to apply but need specialised tertiary training to be accepted.Requires {p} people.

name: Local Business IT Improvement
description: Maker's Centre is advertised to provide IT knowledgeable workers. Two local businesses have requested tertiary IT skilled workers. Requires {p} people.

name: Tertiary Skills Lesson
description: A general tertiary skills lesson in the Maker's Centre which has multiple segments. Requires {p} people.

name: Event Hiring
description: The upcoming Johannesburg Art Festival is looking for IT-related staff. They have requested if any participants of Maker's Centre would be available. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Coding Classes
description: The centre is providing coding classes to teach basics for programming languages. Requires {p} people.

name: IT Certification Program
description: A program designed to credit participants with IT qualifications capable for high-demand tech jobs. Requires {p} people.

name: IT Engineer Experience
description: Local engineering companies are short-staffed on graphic designers. Requires {p} people.

name: Digital Arts Day
description: For fun, the centre is hosting a day with special graphic design software to increase interest in participating with the centre. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: AI Education Class
description: Participants are welcomed to the centre to experience the class based upon AI with expert guest speakers. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Starter Investment
description: This new upcoming starter business needs an investment in order to open its doors. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Loan for Expansion
description: This recently popular business is requesting for a segmented loan in order to capitalise on its surging growth. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Infrastructure Financing
description: A successful past participant of Maker's Centre has permission to build a shop for their business. They have applied to receive funding to start the process. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Further Education for Participant
description: A participant has successfully been accepted into a third level education course. However, they cannot cover the expense of the first year of tuition. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Small Business Grant
description: Local business starting out has applied for a grant to purchase additional equipment. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Sponsorship Fund
description: Local tech competition requires a sponsorship to entice participants for their startup contest. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Renewable Energy Grant
description: A local entrepreneur wants to incorporate renewable energy into their business, using solar panels. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Solar Panel Maintenance
description: One of the solar panels on the centre's roof was damaged due to weather, it needs to be repaired. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Local Business Expansion
description: A successful business wants to expand to a second location in Maker's Valley but needs financial support. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Export Development Fund
description: A local business wants to export its products internationally but needs funding for it. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Local Entrepreneur Workshop
description: A local tech entrepreneur wants to visit the Maker's Centre and give lessons on how to use computer software. Food must be provided. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Group Trip to Local Business
description: A local business has invited a Maker's Centre workshop group to their shop, to display a day of work. Transport is needed for the group. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Workshop Week
description: Maker's Centre successfully garnered several business entrepreneurs to visit the centre one day a week each. It is meant to be the biggest workshop attendance ever. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Potential Workshop Addition
description: Participants of Maker's Centre have requested to do a workshop based on textile skills. Textile machinery will need to be ordered for iT. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Customer Service Workshop
description: The centre is providing a workshop for participants to practice their customer service skills. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Product Design Consultation
description: Local manufacturer wants to propose a new design, it is successful. However, they now need the manufacturing cost financed. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Budgeting Training
description: The centre is holding workshops on educating the importance of budgeting financially for good cash flow management. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Business Proposition Day
description: The centre is holding workshops on educating the importance of budgeting financially for good cash flow management. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Brand Identity Consultation
description: Local business has inquired interest in any suitable participants of the centre to employ along with a consultation to help strengthen its identity in the market . Requires {p} people.

name: Green Business Practice
description: A local business wants to adopt a more sustainable impact, it has applied for finance to remake their manufacturing process. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Emergency Relief Fund
description: A power outage has affected several local businesses, and they require financial assistance to recover. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Community Garden
description: The local community has signed a petition to expand on the community garden, the centre should contribute to the cause. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Damage to Street
description: The surrounding road to the centre is damaged with potholes and cracks. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Local Library Upgrade
description: The nearby library is understaffed in the IT department and lacks modern computers. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Health Awareness Campaign
description: A health organisation has suggested in collaborating with the centre and holding an event teaching first aid and increasing health awareness. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Environment Day
description: For the day, the community is out collecting the rubbish on nearby streets. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Disability Access Support
description: Few of the businesses are not easily accessible for users of wheelchairs, there is an application to build ramps for access. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Community Park Renovation
description: Few of the participants of the centre have mentioned the lack of maintenance the nearby park gets, they have inquired if the centre could help. Requires {m} ZAR.

name: Neighbourhood Safety
description: Some people in the are have reported to the centre about dark dangerous areas at night. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Natural Disaster Preparation
description: Participants of the centre have showcased signs of inexperience in relation to natural disasters, some suggest hosting a training course and creating emergency kits. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Increase in Maker's Centre Popularity
description: People from the local area are intrigued by the centre and decide to participate. Gain 50 people.

name: Government Funding Scheme
description: The government continues to support Maker's Centre and donates to strengthen its finance capabilities. Gain 250000 ZAR

name: Past Participant Problem
description: A past participant's business that was previously given loans by Maker's Centre went into liquidation. Lose 45000 ZAR

name: Participant Quitting
description: Several participants stopped coming to Maker's Centre. Lose 20 people

name: Worldwide Donation
description: From international donators online, the centre has amassed a substantial portion to continue community aid. Gain 750000 ZAR
